Server.summary: Gets or sets the name or address of the MySQL instance to connect to.
Server.remarks: If this property is not set, then the provider will attempt to connect to localhost even though this property will return String.Empty.

Database.summary: Gets or sets the name of the database that should be selected when the connection is first opened.
Database.remarks: There is no default for this property and, if not set, the connection will not have a current database until one is set using the method.

ConnectionProtocol.summary: Gets or sets the connection protocol that is being used for this connection.

PipeName.summary: Gets or sets the name of the named pipe object that the provider should use.
PipeName.remarks: This property has no effect unless the property has been set to NamedPipe.
